class.sql: select "NUMBER","NAME",SEX,SEX_VALUE,DORM_CODE,COME_DATE,OUT_DATE,OUT_TYPE,OUT_TYPE_VALUE,HOLD_BEGIN,HOLD_END,DETOX_END, DETOX_LIMIT,DETOX_LIMIT_VALUE,MANAGE_TYPE_VALUE,MANAGE_TYPE,PICTURE_STATE,OUT_DOC_STATE,BASE_COFIRM_STA,IDENTITY_ID from T_FCF_OUTDETOX_INFO where ALREADY_OUT='Y' <#if userName?? && userName!= ''> and "NAME" like '%${userName}%' </#if> <#if userNumer?? && userNumer!= ''> and "NUMBER" = :userNumer </#if> <#if identity?? && identity!= ''> and IDENTITY_ID=:identity </#if> <#if outDateStart?? && outDateStart!= ''> AND (to_date(TRUE_OUT_DATA,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=to_date(:outDateStart,'yyyy-mm-dd')) </#if> <#if outDateEnd?? && outDateEnd!= ''> AND (to_date(TRUE_OUT_DATA,'yyyy-mm-dd')<=to_date(:outDateEnd,'yyyy-mm-dd')) </#if> <#if outTypeValue?? && outTypeValue!= ''> and OUT_TYPE_VALUE=:outTypeValue </#if>

select "NAME","NUMBER",SEX,SEX_VALUE,BIRTH,POLITICAL_STATUS,POLITICAL_STATUS_VALUE,HOUSE_ADDR,HOUSE_ADDR_VALUE,NATIONALITY_VALUE,PROCESS_STATE, HOUSE_DETAIL_ADDR,EDUCATION,IDENTITY_ID,WORK_ADDR,WORK,WORK_VALUE,HOLD_END,MANAGE_TYPE_VALUE,"POSITION",EDUCATION_VALUE,DETOX_BEGIN, SPECIAL_INDENTITY,IDENTITY_TYPE,IDENTITY_TYPE_VALUE,SPECIALTY,SPECIALTY_VALUE,EMPHASIS_PERSONER_VALUE,SPECIAL_INDENTITY_VALUE,OUT_PLACE_VALUE, DORM_CODE,DETOX_LIMIT,DETOX_LIMIT_VALUE,DETOX_END,OUT_DATE,OUT_REASON,OUT_REASON_VALUE,BRIEF,KS_USER_ID from T_FCF_OUTDETOX_INFO where 1=1 <#if userNumber?? && userNumber!= ''> and "NUMBER"=:userNumber </#if> <#if prisonId?? && prisonId!= ''> and DORM_CODE=:prisonId </#if>
select count("NUMBER") as TOTAL from T_FCF_OUTDETOX_INFO where ALREADY_OUT='Y' <#if outTypeValue?? && outTypeValue!= ''> and OUT_TYPE_VALUE=:outTypeValue </#if>

select "NAME","NUMBER",SEX,SEX_VALUE,BIRTH,POLITICAL_STATUS,POLITICAL_STATUS_VALUE,HOUSE_ADDR,HOUSE_ADDR_VALUE,NATIONALITY_VALUE,PROCESS_STATE,OUT_TYPE, HOUSE_DETAIL_ADDR,EDUCATION,IDENTITY_ID,WORK_ADDR,WORK,WORK_VALUE,HOLD_END,MANAGE_TYPE_VALUE,"POSITION",EDUCATION_VALUE,DETOX_BEGIN,ORIGIN_VALUE, SPECIAL_INDENTITY,IDENTITY_TYPE,IDENTITY_TYPE_VALUE,SPECIALTY,SPECIALTY_VALUE,EMPHASIS_PERSONER_VALUE,SPECIAL_INDENTITY_VALUE,OUT_PLACE_VALUE, DORM_CODE,DETOX_LIMIT,DETOX_LIMIT_VALUE,DETOX_END,OUT_DATE,OUT_REASON,OUT_REASON_VALUE,BRIEF,KS_USER_ID,IMPRISON_LIMIT,BASE_COFIRM_STA,OUT_DOC_STATE from T_FCF_OUTDETOX_INFO where (ALREADY_OUT='Y') <#if ksId?? && ksId!= ''> and KS_USER_ID=:ksId </#if>
